sentences.sContent: She and her brother are both at boarding school.
sentences.sCn: 她和她弟弟都在寄宿学校念书。

sentences.sContent: "It was school, " she said. "I went to a boarding school.
sentences.sCn: “都是学校做的好事”，她说，“我去了一所寄宿学校。

sentences.sContent: I can stand Janet now. She and her brother are both at boarding school.
sentences.sCn: 维罗尼卡说，“我现在能受得了珍妮特，她兄妹两都在寄宿学校。”

trans.tranOther: a school where students live as well as study
